name.ja: <ruby>慈<rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby>愛<rt>あい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>賢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby>－シエラ

text.en:
(This card is always treated as a "Sky Striker" card.)
You can discard 1 Spell; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish 1 Spell from your GY; give control of this card to your opponent, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Sky Striker Ace" monster from your GY. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can target 1 of your banished "Sky Striker" Spells; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Love Magi - Ciela" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG Stories Volume 1 promotional card
